11.content:
Mayl was sitting at home watching TV when suddenly an emergency news broadcast popped up.

‘Strange’ Mayl thought ‘I wonder what’s going on?’

Ribitta appeared on the screen

‘There have been reports of an unusual virus spreading through the net, it only seems to affect female navis, causing them to gain large amounts of weight, net users are warned to switch off their navis so that they cannot receive or spread the virus to others.’

‘Oh No, Roll!’ Mayl shouted, rushing into her room and snatching her PET, she switched it off quickly and returned to the television just in time to see a button pop off Ribitta’s shirt as her expanding belly started to grow noticeably under her clothes, Ribitta blushed and attempted to cover it.

‘In a shocking new development, it seems that the virus is somehow able to spread into the real world through contact with an infected PET, please ignore our previous warning and make no attempt to touch it.’

Mayl shrieked and threw her PET onto the sofa, ‘Wonderful…’ she thought ‘if Roll was somehow infected, now I have it too!’

Mayl decided to-
11.title: Emergency broadcast

111.content:
Mayl looked to her PET worriedly. Was Roll okay? Mayl thought for a few seconds. Mayl had already touched the PET. If Roll did have the virus, then Mayl was already infected. If by some chance Roll didn't, then Mayl could try and do what she could to prevent it.

Roll grabbed some nearby gloves in an effort to avoid getting the virus, reluctantly reached for her PET, and turned it on. Seconds later she saw that Roll...
111.title: Checking just in case.

1111.content:
Mayl let out a sigh of relief. Roll showed no signs of infection, and retained her lean, graceful figure. Roll cocked her head to the side a bit, curious.

"Mayl? What's the matter? You looked a little... Spooked."

Mayl brushed her hair back, and began to explain...

"It was just on the TV... There's some wacko virus going around, and it's only infecting female NetNavis... And, somehow, it seems to be able to cross into the physical world. It makes them bloat up like whales..."

She let out another sigh, one of exasperation.

"I'm going to have to turn you off until this blows over, Roll. I'm sorry."

However, just as she was about to deactivate her PET...

"Mayl, wait."

Her hand was stayed, for the moment, and Roll began to speak...

"Let me try and handle this. Go and tell the boys, and see if they can jack in. If it won't affect male NetNavis, maybe it won't affect men, either... And, in the meantime, maybe you can go somewhere else. Leave the PET in here, and... I don't know... Get a bite to eat?"

Mayl considered it. With this bizarre virus going around, she might end up being the thinnest girl in town, if she was careful... No reason not to indulge in a meal. And Roll knew how to handle herself... And she wouldn't be alone, after all.

"Well... Alright. I'll go call them up, and see if they can help."

---

Two phone calls and fifteen minutes later, GutsMan, MegaMan, and Roll were jacked in, and standing in the middle of the NetSquare. However, they were not there long before a scream rang out, and a comely female Navi came running from a horde of grinning, spherical viruses, clad in traditional white chef's hats and brandishing covered entree dishes springing after her. She almost looked like she would have gotten away, when a gigantic, fridge-like virus dropped in front of her from the air, blocking her path. In an instant the door whipped open, and a white light cast its frosted glare over her.

"N-no! Noo-oooh... Oh. That... That looks good."

She was brought down to her knees, and slowly shuffled over to the fridge. From where they stood, MegaMan.EXE and his friends could hear the sounds of slovenly, unrestrained gorging. The impish little chefs cast a death glare at the fridge, clucking.

"Tsk! No fun. Stupid Fridge! No fun for us..."

Slowly, one of them drew their gaze past the Fridge.EXE and its slowly burgeoning victim, to the feminine form of Roll.

"Ah! Ah! Look! Another one! GET HER! JAM HER FULL!"

And as soon as the word was out, they all leaped forth into action, intent on stuffing her to the gills...
1111.title: First Encounter!

11112.content:
The group gawked, jaws agape. There were way too many of those things... There was no way that would they be able to win this fight. Desperately, MegaMan looked around for an escape route, and his eyes were drawn to a path to the side that would lead them away... But it would be impossible for them to get to it in time. But just then, GutsMan stepped out to meet the feeding frenzy.

"Leave this to me! I'll stomp those runts flat! You two go on ahead... And don't let anything happen to Roll, or I'll knock you into next week...!"

MegaMan nodded.

"Good luck, GutsMan. Come on Roll... We have to get out of here!"

Without a further word, they sprinted down the path. GutsMan occupied the feed-happy horde, glowering as they pulled out all assortment of cooking utensils... Knives, forks, ladles, whisks and spatulas and egg beaters, cleavers and potato peelers... He regarded them all with a huff, and began to charge, rearing his fist back, windmilling it a bit...

"You want to take me on? I don't think... THAT YOU HAVE THE GUTS! YEEEEEE-HAAAAAW!"

And the fight began with a devastating haymaker, sending a group of viruses flying through the air.

Meanwhile...

---

"Huff... I, I think we lost them... I hope GutsMan is alright..."

MegaMan put his hand on Roll's shoulder as a comforting gesture. "He'll be alright. He's not going to be beaten by a bunch of small fries like that."

She nodded, reassured. "You're right. We'll meet up with him later... But, for now... Where are we...?"

She looked around... They'd ran so fast and far, it almost seemed like a blur. This place was unfamiliar... The floor tiles were decorated in intricate patterns, in pastel colors... After a few seconds, MegaMan recognized them.

"...Yumland? We couldn't have gone that far... But then, where are we?"

He looked ahead to a security cube, blocking off further access to the area, when suddenly, they heard voices from behind!

"...So glad the boss showed up... That bruiser will get it now, for sure! I still can't believe he deleted so many of us... Nasty, nasty man..."

Three of the manic little cook viruses plodded along...

"...But at least he gave us the code to get back in... Guess it's time for the big guns...?!?"

The two groups took a good, long look at each other, before the viruses pulled out some non-stick frying pans.

"IT'S THEM! GET 'EM!"

MegaMan smirked. "We can handle you three!" He let loose a volley of virus busting code, taking down one who did not bring his pan to guard quick enough. The other two attacked quickly, one diverting MegaMan's attention while the other appeared in front of Roll, cackling a bit as it brought forth an entree dish and lifted the lid, revealing a sumptuous looking plate of cinnamon rolls, glazed with a thick layer of icing... They glistened on the plate, a delicious smell of cinnamon wafting over, filling her nostrils. A sensory overload of sight and scent overcame her, and she felt compelled to devour the entirety of the plate...
11112.title: Rolls for Roll

111121.content:
As the thickly glazed rolls steamed in front of Roll, pratically bursting in every delicious virtual ingredient anybody cook could program, she backed away slowly, having to grab one of her arms to prevent it from reaching out for one. Yet the cook virus continued to advance on her, Roll knowing calling out for Mega Man's help would result in an instant force feeding. She merely stared him down as he grinned manically, still tempting her with his alluring entree dish.

"Y'know, I have other ways of making you comply with this new diet!"

Roll's eyes widened, but she kept her stern posture. "I bet you don-Mmmpttth!"

The moment she opened her mouth, she was assaulted by an entire volley of cinnamon rolls, sent directly into her gullet.

"Actually you were right, though lucky for me, you're still an idiot!"

Roll's eyes rolled slightly up from the rich taste which met her mouth. After a few large chews, she managed to stomach the entirety of the cinnamon rolls, licking her lips. Besides the stuffed belly, it was Roll's face which proved she was under the virus' spell. Recomposing herself, she walked towards the cook virus with a dopey smile, patting her globular, yoga-ball belly.

"Ooooh, pleeeeeaaaase tell me you have more where that came from..." She pratically moaned.

"Oh, the boss is going to just love you." Beckoning the stuffed Navi to follow him, the virus waddled over to the security cube and after inserting a card, the two left Mega Man to fight off the oncoming horde, unaware he'd already failed Roll succumbing to this bizarre virus outbreak.

---

As Roll followed the small virus in a daze which was only kept up on the virus' behalf by constantly re-feeding small samples of her beloved cinnamon rolls, they stopped at a clearing. "Eh? He oughta be here. Man, why we've gotta be outranked by this clown's a mystery to me, but whatever. Chubby chops, just wait here, allright?" Before Roll could even answer, he'd already left, stranding her in the middle of apparently nowhere.

Oh man, this is bad. At least that cravings subdued now... I've gotta catch up with the others! Claiming back her self-control due to the lack of sugary temptations, Roll started to look for an exit. She wasn't hit that badly: just a bit of extra softness on her thighs and stomach, nothing a bit of exercise could work off. The pure euphoria she experienced while eating concerned her however: she'd have to avoid even smelling any food if she wanted to get out of this slim and taut. Yet just as she had found what she thought to be the path back to where Mega Man was...
111121.title: Resistance is Futile!

choices: Roll begins to get pumped with delectable icing!
1111211.content:
The entire floor started to quake, enough to send Roll flying backwards onto her butt. Retreating slightly, she jumped back to meet this aggressor from a safe distance. Earlier, she had just established that naturally tasting, but even smelling any food was probably enough to send her flying off into a half-conscious eating frenzy. Sight couldn't possibly be that much of a factor of what could make her subside to the forces of gluttony, right?

Wrong.

What stood in-front of her was a slightly-built boy, with a tall and confident posture, jet black hair and a warm, friendly expression. The only thing which would've suggested what stood a few metres from Roll wasn't a Navi was the slightly too inviting smile, or his yellow eyes which constantly darted around Roll and her surroundings, as if he was quickly measuring her and her situation.

There was also the massive arm cannon, still dripping with a slight amount of something creamy looking he had in place of an arm and how his body was richly decorated in icing with embedded candy drops, which glimmered like alluring jewels on an extravagant royal robe. Yeah, that was probably a bigger giveaway than most.

"Well then, aren't you just the cutest little Navi!" He said, as Roll tried to plan how she would size-up the situation. He looked appetizing in more ways than one to be sure, but there was no doubt he'd be trouble.

"Awww, don't be shy! I'm Candy Man. What's yours?" He reached out a hand as Roll hesitated for a moment, looking at the outstretched hand as if it was about to detonate. "... It won't bite. Promise."

She decided complying to whatever this 'Candy Man' for the first few moments would at least buy her some time.

"I'm Roll." she quietly muttered as she shook his hand.

"Well, that's a sweet name for a sweet looking girl." He chuckled, though there was a hint of force behind it. "So, I'm guessing you've heard about all these viruses recently breaking out, fattening the virtual and real world female population. Seen any of those cook viruses behind it yet?" He simply seemed to be making light conversation to lead onto something bigger, but Roll didn't want to risk acting brash with this man.

"Eh, yeah. One managed to get me but he ran off a few moments ago... I'm alright." She nervously said, not wanting to elaborate too much on the addictive food to encourage this guy.

"My, I hope you weren't too beaten up. Those viruses are so rough, aren't they?" He started to walk closer, and now outstretched his icing-filled arm cannon, as his tone started to drop to a more cynical, sarcastic tone. "I mean, who decided to put them in charge? Somebody had to know how to properly treat ladies like yourself with respect."

Roll turned to run, yet a quick blast from Candy Man's cannon stuck both her feet in place, the icing drying up like colorful cement. "And such a smart lady too, from the looks of it. Tut tut, but such a skinny figure too, shame you're body doesn't seem as bouncy and cheerful as your face." As he smirked, Roll started to whimper. His cannon was dangerously close to her mouth now.

"You don't really want to go through with this, do you?" Roll nervously asked, beads of digital sweat dropping down her face.

Candy Man paused. "Actually, I think I want to do this more than anything else in the world, especially on such a cute Navi like yourself. I'm gonna make the whole world taste good! Though first..." He collected a small dab of icing with his other finger, and jabbed it into Roll's mouth. She stopped protesting and with a cute yet only slightly-aware grin, opening her mouth. Her watering eyes were the only visible proof of non-compliance on her face. "I love it when they realize how much they want it."

With a click, the cannon started to whir into gear, aimed directly at Roll's anticipating mouth. "FILL 'ER UP!!!"
1111211.title: CANDY MAN CAN

choices: Candy Man makes his way to his destination
Roll becomes too heavy for Candy Man to carry (You choose the weight)
11112111.content:
Normally somebody in this kind of situation would imagine gurgling, frantic breathing and the unfortunate victim clawing for dear life at the feeder's face for being such a prat. Roll herself would've expected her to have a similarly unpleasant experience yet... As the icing flowed well into her body, Roll managing to feel the digital substance move all around her body as if it were washing over her, she was... feeling pretty bouncy..

Not exactly in a state of bliss or euphoria, but contrary to her protest mere seconds earlier, she was rather enjoying Candy Man's forced feeding, moving her arms away from the vibrating cannon and moving them on her slowly ballooning body. As she poked and prodded her softening belly, she felt Candy Man slowly pick her up and start to walk off, holding her like a huge baby with a bizarre bottle. She giggled at this mental image, again slowly forgetting this virus was fully intent on pulling her into immobility and... Well, nobody was really sure what the reasoning behind the fattening virus outbreak had been.

Within a few minutes, Roll had well entered the 300's, her belly now touting her namesake. She could also feel her butt growing softer, slightly oozing over Candy Man's palm. Still sucking away with a look of pure-complacency, Candy Man suddenly removed the pump. Roll quickly turned to him, yet accidentally letting out a satisfied burp in his face. "Whoops... Eh, sorry Candy Man. What's with taking away the pump?" She saw his smile take a turn for the devious. "Plotting something else for me?" Roll said, with only polite-curiosity in her voice despite her context.

"Oh no, don't you worry you cute little button, the Candy man here's gonna make sure you have more than your fair share. But now that you're all warmed up to the idea of being... Well, I guess the sky's the limit in this case!" Roll giggled a bit. "Heh, there's no sky in the Net!"

"Well then, that's even less to worry about hitting while blimping you up! But what I was really going to say was, don't you think your Navi operator ought to have just as much fun as you?" Roll snorted in laughter. "Pffft, I doubt Mayl would find this fun! Though all of this weight does get instantly added to her once we talk to each other, right?" "Right." "And... Will she gain as much as I gain afterward?" "If the plan's all it's cracked up to be, then yes!"

"Well then, I'll call her up now. Heh, funny thing about all this Candy Man- I wasn't meant to talk to her AT ALL if something like this happened! But... Eh, she'll like this, won't she?" Roll asked, moving her hands around her flabby frame.

"I'm sure she'll come to appreciate it the same way you have. Though I doubt she'll be nearly as adorable a beached whale as you'll be!"

Roll blushed at the rather bizarre compliment, yet before contacting Mayl, paused. "Well, if I help you with your plan... Can you tell me what you're doing with us? Both in the Net and in Earth?"

Candy Man paused for a moment, then sighed, obviously frustrated at how long this process was taking. "Very well, Roll. Our boss, in the real world, wants... Well, you know how some people like collecting things?" Roll nodded. "Well, this particular person likes to collect Navi's. But more importantly, their operators. And even more specifically, girls. But of course, that's frowned in society..." Roll's face was blank. "That's... That's kind of weird I guess." "Very. But don't tell anybody I said that, the boss can get very... 'Passionate' about this life work of his."

"So, why all the fattening then?" Roll asked, starting to eye the cannon which was half-carrying her.

"'The more the merrier'. I honestly wish I could tell you more about why somebody in the real world would want so many girls the size of warehouses, but at least me and the others get our fair share of these stupid 'real' girl's Navi's! We've been programmed to want you as such." He ended, prodding Roll's pink belly before starting up his cannon again.

"Now, let's give 'Mayl' a quick little call before we start up again, alright Roll?"
11112111.title: Human Collection

111121111.content:
Roll nodded, sending her plumped cheeks bouncing a bit as she attempted to get into contact with Mayl, while her candy-coated captor carried her into the deeper and darker recesses of the YumNet. She began to wonder if perhaps they were en route to the UnderNet. Finally, her call went through, and she was faced with... A large space of air where her operator should be. The location on the screen didn't seem to be Mayl's house, either... Rather, it was some sort of bakery. Roll broke away from her suckling of the cannon, causing a stray pump of icing to drizzle down her front. "...Mayl?"

She was answered by a voice that came from off-screen. "Roll? Is that you? Are you alright? Lan and Dex called and told me you got separated from the others! Did you find anything out?" Slowly, the source of the voice came onscreen, and it took Roll a moment to recognize it as her operator. She was clad thickly, in umpire's gear, shades, and oven mitts, and held a pair of tongs and a pen in her hand, apparently the methods by which she hoped to prevent transference of the virus, if Roll had caught it... Which indeed she had. The pretty pink netnavi didn't fail to notice the box of doughnuts that sat on the bed beside her. Mayl sighed. "I knew I said I'd leave the PET at home, but when I heard that you'd been separated from everyone... I just got so worried... And... Um." With a jangle of clasps, the operator cocked her head to the side quizzically. "Roll, did you...? Oh no! You've got the virus!" Mayl looked down to her figure, to see if it had been bloating up without her realizing.

11112112.content:
"CLICK CLICK BOOM, BABY!" A large energy bolt slammed into Candy Man, sending him flying into the air. He landed with a crunch, parts of his sweets-themed armor breaking off at the impact. Roll suddenly snapped to as she realized just how close she was to being turned into an immobile blob. She looked to find her savior, and witnessed the strangest Navi she'd ever seen. Standing only 4'6" in normal measurements, it, no, SHE, was powerfully built, with long arms coated in armor, two strange weapons(they looked like machine guns) hanging from her hands. She was angular and smooth, possibly alluding to exceptional agility. A red visor covered her eyes, a square, cyclopian bar acting as an eye. Short, cropped black hair was flowing out from an angled helm from which the visor hung, swaying a little as the recoil settled. But what caught Roll's attention was the thing that had CAUSED the recoil.

A massive cannon was attached to its back, smoking slightly from a slender barrel. Whirring sounds could be heard as the barrel flipped over where it connected to the main gun, folding up for storage. The strange Navi had had to brace itself just to use the thing! However, Roll wasn't worried about the newcomer just now. Candy Man had recovered from the blast, and now had a wicked, sadistic grin on his face. His teeth were sharper than before, and his yellow eyes were gleaming evilly.

"Naughty naughty, little girl. You shouldn't be messing with the big boys, hmm?" He brought up his icing cannon, charged it up, and unleashed an enormous hailstorm of sugary sweetness, the sinuous, thick rope of icing headed straight for the other Navi. Roll gasped and yelled out a warning as the stream flowed out towards its target. "NO! LOOK OUT!" She was too late. The thick stream collided with the other one, seemingly deleting it in one shot. With that one out of the way, Roll was now the prime target again. "Oh no, not again..."

Candy Man was looking royally pissed. His mouth was set in a vicious smile, his eyes glazed over with a maniacal look. "Now, my dear, back to our little matter..." Taking another swig of icing from his cannon, he thrust his fingers into Roll's mouth, and her eyes glazed over yet again. A small roll of pudge formed from this piece, and he laughed evilly. "This kind of icing is ten times more fattening than any known substance on earth. And now, you'll be my first victim... ha ha ha.... Now... [b]FILL 'ER UP![b/]"

The thick liquid streamed into Roll's stomach, and soon, she became fit for her name. Ten seconds into the liquid stuffing, her features were softening immediately, a small double chin forming. Her belly began to flow out, pooling out into her lap, and her thighs and hips thickened, filling up with calories as the stuff kept pumping. Thirty seconds into it, she looked to be two hundred pounds. As he continued to stuff her, another huge laser blast erupted into his vision, and he was blown clear across the stage and off the edge. Roll simply cried out for more of the hyper-fattening treat, crawling toward the drop off in hopes of reaching that sweet ambrosia. But a strong metal hand gripped her arm and dragged her away.

"Wait-! What're you doing? I have to get moooorrrrrreeee!!!!!" she whined. "Besides, I can't go with strange Navis I don't know!" Roll looked up to see the mysterious one she saw earlier, coated in a sugary film that dripped off the edges of her armor.

"NO! We have to get going before that freak comes back!"

"I don't even know your name!"

The small Navi looked back to her. Retracting the red visor, Roll looked into her smooth grey eyes, and calmed down immediately.

"If you really want a name, call me Mesa. Mesa Chateau."




(If you need images of what Mesa looks like, here: http://www.thewiredblog.com/wp-content/u... http://www.sungsfamily.net/bbs/files/att...)

choices: Candy Man continues with explaining this story's backstory!
111121122.content:
"Mesa? Ugh..." Roll felt her new plump tummy rumble a bit, lifting it with both hands and dropping it to see how her fat jiggled. "Yeah, sorry, I guess that stuff also messed up my head again..." With a bit of effort, Roll recomposed herself and seemed to of gained most of her conscious back. "Right then Mesa, lead the way!"

Grabbing his hand, the two made their way towards safer ground. "I'm Roll by the-" Roll started as their escape was cut-off by a laser cannon which skimmed just over the top of their heads.

"DUCK!" Mesa shouted as he forced Roll down with a heavy hand. "Looks like we have company... Find cover somewhere while I take down this wave of goons... Maybe the last room we were in... Just hurry!" Mesa commanded a slightly dazed Roll.

Roll nodded in acknowledgment, dashing (or moving as quickly as she could in her now corpulent frame) to the nearest exist from where they'd come. Unfortunately, she'd neglected the possibility that a certain 'sweet' guy wasn't as deleted as she'd hoped.

As she waited in the next room with her slightly drooping tummy in one hand, she heard a familiar voice over her shoulder. "You sure are a tough one to keep down... Roll, was it? Now, where were we?" Jumping back, Roll turns around and keeps her ground, despite her somewhat pudgier frame. "I don't know how you're still here... But I'm not falling for your 'charm' again!" Candy Man merely laughed.

"Oh, it's a shame to hear that I can't smooth talk you again, sweetie. But-" Uplifting his icing cannon, he started to eye her closely, as if expecting a certain reaction. "... I'm fairly sure you're eager to help me out regardless. You have to 'get moooorrrrrreeee', don't you Roll?" He said in a comical exageration of what she'd cried out at the end of their previous meeting. As he smirked, Candy Man's cannon started to drip ever-so-slowly, to further bait the vulnerable Navi.

"No... I mean, YES!" Roll suddenly realized what she was saying. "No! I meant to say no, you creep! You heard me, I said 'Yes... Wait-" She realized that even in the presence of the viruses' addictive substance her mind started to cloud up. She started to swagger a bit, losing her footing and falling flat on her stomach, without moving for a few seconds.

"Eh... Hello?" Candy Man said, begining to nervously ponder if his pump was just as apt at killing Navi's. He quickly walked up to her and lifting up her head, saw Roll slowly open her eyes with a warm smile. "I still think you're a creep, but I've made my decision-" With a short pause, she bellowed in mimicking the Candy Man earlier "FILL ME UP!" Pulling the icing cannon with one of her chubby arms and wedging it in her mouth, she beckoned him to do his deed.

As the liquid started to slowly flow back into the Navi's gullet, with Roll purring happily, Candy Man let out a sigh of relief. "THAT was a close one. The boss would throw a fit if we screwed up fattening these girls... And I bet he'll like you just fine once I'm done with you... Heh heh heh."

11122121.content:
Gotta get outside, gotta get outside... Mayl desperately thought to herself as her mouth started to salivate from not eating for several minutes. Gotta use the house robots to help me outside... Perfect!

"Robots!" She called out as several servant bots wheeled over to her immobile form. "... You call this feeding? I'm starving! Go faster!" With a beep of acknowledgment, the bots whirled away, frantically coming back with piles of ridiculously greasy and fattening food, all of which splattered all over the house and Mayl's own immense body as she decimated platter after platter of food. After a few moments, Mayl let out a burp which partially shook some of the room's furniture. Suffice to say, she was becoming the embodiment of gluttony. "Hey! You call this food filling?" The blob girl called from outside the kitchen were robots continued to madly dash to and fro to gather food for their greedy master. "Just deep grill everything and smother it in chocolate!"

As she gobbled through some buckets of deep fried chicken floating in a bucket of melted chocolate like a disastrous fondue experiment, Mayl was torn physically and mentally.
